item.description:
It's time to see Tim Gearan again and this time it?s for a great cause! Hey, wait a minute? I know what you?re thinking: ?Oh no, not a benefit!?? Well, this isn't one of those boring tea-social benefits. This is to benefit the On And Off Mass Ave Film Project a fantastic endeavor to document local artists where they feel at home the most-performing for you!

What a better place to hold this great event than Club Passim a non-profit cultural center that has been cultivating and preserving folk music for more than 40 years, right here in Cambridge!

Hey, as those who attended the Gearan Up @ Atwoods event will testify, Tim Gearan alone is worth the $20, but check out some of the other local artists:
Rose Polenzani
Jennifer Kimball
Anne Heaton
Brian Webb
Chris O'Brien
Meg Hutchinson
Tim Gearan's website

The show starts at 7:30 pm but I'll be there early enjoying the yummy vegetarian food at the Veggie Planet located inside the club.

!! IMPORTANT NOTES !!
1. I'll be doing the $20 dinner ticket so I can have a table. When ordering your tickets (online or over the phone) you MUST mention my name, Tim) and that you want to sit with me and "The Beantown Music Group"

2. This is a small venue (less than 125 occupancy) and you WILL loose your table seat if you are LATE and people are waiting to be seated!!! Not my rules, sorry! Parking is tuff in this area too. So plan ahead and be there early.

3. Once there, the food is CASH ONLY! Veggie Planet only takes cash, so bring some green stuff!

Buy Your Club Passim Dinner Tickets Now
**Don't forget to print your ticket if you buy online!! They don't mail them out! **
item.name: 2nd Gearan And More!
